name: Trac Mirror
summary: Trac is a minimalistic web-based software project
short_description:
Trac is a minimalistic web-based software project management and issue tracking system. It provides an interface to revision control systems (Subversion), an integrated Wiki and convenient report facilities.

Trac allows wiki markup in issue descriptions and commit messages, to create links and seamless references between bugs, tasks, changesets, files and wiki pages. A timeline shows all project events in order, making getting an overview of the project and tracking progress very easy.
